code: export var setAccounts=function setAccounts(accounts){return{type:'SET_ACCOUNTS',payload:accounts};};export var setTransactions=function setTransactions(transactions){return{type:'SET_TRANSACTIONS',payload:transactions};};export var deleteAccount=function deleteAccount(accountId){return{type:'DELETE_ACCOUNT',payload:accountId};};export var deposit=function deposit(amount,accountId){return{type:'DEPOSIT',payload:{amount:amount,accountId:accountId}};};export var withdraw=function withdraw(amount,accountId){return{type:'WITHDRAW',payload:{amount:amount,accountId:accountId}};};export var depositTransaction=function depositTransaction(transactionId,accountId,amount){return{type:'DEPOSIT_TRANSACTION',payload:{transactionId:transactionId,accountId:accountId,type:"deposit",amount:amount,name:"Money has been deposited"}};};export var withdrawalTransaction=function withdrawalTransaction(transactionId,accountId,amount){return{type:'WITHDRAWAL_TRANSACTION',payload:{transactionId:transactionId,accountId:accountId,type:"withdraw",amount:amount,name:"Money has been withdrawn"}};};
